title: Boukyaku no Shirushi to Hime
sinopse:
After 3662 blind dates, the 160-years-old Headless King that everyone fears of, is finally getting married! But when he faces the cute and gentle Princess, the King keeps hiding from her instead!? How will the Headless King and the Princess get to know each other?

(Source: MU)

Included one-shot:
Volume 7: Ganges-gawa de Sayounara (ガンジス川でさようなら)
